home.createVideoDesc: Generate stunning videos from text or topics
home.visualizerDesc: Create lyric videos from audio files

visualizer.dropSubtitles: Drop SRT file here or click to browse

common.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave? Your changes will be lost.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to view this page

story.describeYourConcept: Describe your concept and we'll shape it into scenes, characters, and a visual storyboard.
story.placeholderStory: A detective discovers that the murder they're investigating was committed by their own future self...
story.narrationDescription: Generate AI voiceover for each scene using Gemini TTS.
story.animationDescription: Convert storyboard images to animated video clips using DeAPI or Veo.

short-film-drama.name: Short Film - Drama
short-film-drama.description: A compelling 3-5 minute dramatic short with emotional arc, character development, and cinematic visuals.
short-film-drama.scene1_action: Opening scene establishing the protagonist and their world.
short-film-drama.scene2_action: The inciting incident that disrupts the protagonist's life.

horror-short.name: Horror Short
horror-short.description: A tense 2-3 minute horror piece with atmospheric tension, jump scares, and unsettling imagery.
horror-short.scene1_action: Establishing an unsettling atmosphere. Something feels wrong.
horror-short.scene3_action: The horror reveals itself. Peak terror moment.

comedy-sketch.name: Comedy Sketch
comedy-sketch.description: A punchy 1-2 minute comedy sketch with setup, escalation, and punchline.
comedy-sketch.scene1_action: Setup: Establish the normal situation and characters.
comedy-sketch.scene2_action: Complication: Something absurd happens or is revealed.
comedy-sketch.scene3_action: Punchline: The comedic payoff that lands the joke.

sci-fi-concept.name: Sci-Fi Concept
sci-fi-concept.description: A visually stunning 2-4 minute science fiction piece exploring futuristic themes.
sci-fi-concept.scene1_action: Establishing the world and its advanced technology.
sci-fi-concept.scene2_action: Introduction of the central concept or conflict.
sci-fi-concept.scene3_action: The implications of the technology unfold.
sci-fi-concept.scene4_action: Philosophical conclusion about humanity and technology.

fantasy-adventure.name: Fantasy Adventure
fantasy-adventure.description: An epic 3-5 minute fantasy journey with magical elements and heroic moments.
fantasy-adventure.scene1_action: Establishing the magical world and its beauty.
fantasy-adventure.scene2_action: The hero receives their quest or calling.
fantasy-adventure.scene3_action: The hero faces trials and demonstrates courage.
fantasy-adventure.scene4_action: Victory and transformation of the hero.

product-showcase.name: Product Showcase
product-showcase.description: A sleek 30-60 second product video highlighting features and benefits.
product-showcase.scene1_action: Dramatic reveal of the product from darkness to light.
product-showcase.scene2_action: Showcase key features with dynamic camera movements.
product-showcase.scene3_action: Product in real-world use showing benefits.
product-showcase.scene4_action: Final product shot with branding and CTA.

brand-story.name: Brand Story
brand-story.description: An emotional 1-2 minute brand video connecting with audience values.
brand-story.scene1_action: Showing the challenge or need the audience faces.
brand-story.scene2_action: The brand's story and passion for solving the problem.
brand-story.scene3_action: How the brand delivers value and changes lives.
brand-story.scene4_action: The future the brand is building with its customers.

tiktok-reel.name: TikTok/Reels Video
tiktok-reel.description: A fast-paced 15-60 second vertical video optimized for social engagement.
tiktok-reel.scene1_action: Grab attention in the first 3 seconds.
tiktok-reel.scene2_action: Deliver the main message or entertainment.

explainer-video.name: Explainer Video
explainer-video.description: A clear 2-3 minute educational video breaking down complex topics.
explainer-video.scene1_action: Introduce the topic and why it matters.
explainer-video.scene2_action: Explain the challenge or question being addressed.
explainer-video.scene3_action: Break down the concept step by step.
explainer-video.scene4_action: Recap the main points and next steps.

music-video-concept.name: Music Video Concept
music-video-concept.description: An artistic 3-4 minute visual narrative designed to accompany music.
music-video-concept.scene1_action: Set the mood and introduce visual themes.
music-video-concept.scene3_action: Development of visual narrative and themes.
music-video-concept.scene4_action: Peak visual moment and satisfying conclusion.

documentary-mini.name: Mini Documentary
documentary-mini.description: A thoughtful 3-5 minute documentary piece exploring a subject in depth.
documentary-mini.scene1_action: Hook the viewer with intriguing footage or statement.
documentary-mini.scene2_action: Provide background and context for the subject.
documentary-mini.scene3_action: Explore the subject through multiple perspectives.
documentary-mini.scene4_action: Leave the viewer with something to think about.

breakdown_progress.craftedFrameByFrame: Your story is being crafted frame by frame

storyboard_progress.renderedFrameByFrame: Your storyboard is being rendered frame by frame...
storyboard_progress.visualMasterpiece: Your visual masterpiece is taking shape...

lock_dialog.scriptFinalized: Your screenplay will be finalized and production begins...
lock_dialog.shotBreakdownInfo: Shot breakdowns will be generated and visuals prepared for production. Final costs may vary based on shot complexity.

export_panel.mp4Desc: Standard video format for all devices
export_panel.importProjectDesc: Select a project file (.json) to import. This will replace your current project.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.emptyHint: Create your first project to get started
projects.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search or filter
projects.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This cannot be undone.
